title: Paint Correction (Compounding / Polishing)
description:
- Detailed exterior cleaning with GTECHNIQ products.

- Removal of paint contaminants by chemical and mechanical means.

- Complete measurement of paint thickness on all panels.

- Polishing in one, two or three steps, depending on the condition of the paint and until achieving the desired correction.

- Degreasing and preparation of the vehicle for application of your chosen protection.


Note:
Scratch removal from 60% to 95%.

The price is determined by the size and condition of the vehicle's paint.

To give you a quote, we need to inspect the vehicle in our studio.
Each inspection is performed on a pre-washed vehicle to give you a recommendation on what is most suitable for you!

Price: from 550 BGN (280 EUR)

title: Glass Cleaning + Coating
description:
- Application of ceramic coating on the front glass - Price: 120 BGN (61 EUR)

- Application of ceramic coating on all vehicle glass - Price: 305 BGN (156 EUR)

Benefits:
• Better visibility in rainy and snowy conditions
• Enhanced visibility in fog
• Reduced glare from wet pavement in bad weather conditions
• Prevention of glass freezing in winter

Durability: 12 months.

- Application of G5 Water Repellent coating (protective hydrophobic layer). After treatment, the glass is easily cleaned from dirt, insects and dust.

Price for front glass: 70 BGN (36 EUR)

Price for all glass: 150 BGN (77 EUR)

Durability: 3-5 months.
